title: Web Developer
description: He/She will be in charge of ensuring websites look good and functions properly. He/She will collaborate with website and graphic designers, monitor website traffic, troubleshoot website problems when they arise, and update the website as necessary.

title: Marketing Manager
description: He/She will gather and analyze information to identify new markets and customers, demand for products and services, and efficacy of existing marketing campaigns and strategies. He/She will conduct market research, sales forecasting, and strategic planning to assess and ensure the sale and profitability of products.
